name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in CI/CD practices and cloud solutions, particularly with **Azure DevOps**, **AWS**, and **Terraform**. My technical prowess includes proficiency with **RDS**, **Oracle**, **MySQL**, and a strong understanding of **Linux** systems, enabling me to build and manage high-performance applications effectively. I am adept at leveraging tools such as **Git**, **SaltStack**, **CloudTrail**, and **Lambda** to ensure robust infrastructure and seamless deployment processes. 
 
In my previous roles, I've developed enterprise-grade platforms, implementing microservices architecture and event-driven systems to enhance application scalability and performance. My deep knowledge in developing secure applications compliant with standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS complements my hands-on experience in **Python** and **Groovy** for scripting automation tasks. I am also well-versed in Agile methodologies, problem-solving, and collaboration, ensuring successful project delivery and team objectives. 
 
Through my experience, I have integrated intelligent automation and real-time data processing with **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, bringing a valuable edge to the healthcare and financial sectors.
